title: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException when Nimbus tries to connect to the engine API
body:

<!-- Note:  Not all sections will apply to all issue types. -->

### Description

Command line to start Nimbus 22.6.1
```
nimbus_beacon_node --network=sepolia --web3-url=http://localhost:12347/ --subscribe-all-subnets --max-peers=96 --enr-auto-update=false  --jwt-secret=/home/nimbus/jwt-secret --suggested-fee-recipient=0xF4e8...287B --terminal-total-difficulty-override=17000000000000000
```

Besu configuration for version 22.4.4
```
network="sepolia"
max-peers=30
data-storage-format="bonsai"
override-genesis-config=["terminalTotalDifficulty=17000000000000000"]
rpc-http-enabled=true
rpc-http-apis=["DEBUG","ETH","NET","ADMIN"]
rpc-http-host="0.0.0.0"
rpc-http-port=12345
rpc-http-cors-origins=["localhost"]
rpc-ws-enabled=true
rpc-ws-host="0.0.0.0"
rpc-ws-port=12346
engine-jwt-enabled=true
engine-jwt-secret="/home/besu/jwt-secret"
engine-rpc-port=12347
engine-host-allowlist=["localhost"]
```

Exception

I see the problem, adding test coverage and fixing it. In the meantime, using websockers should be a workaround, just change:
`--web3-url=http://localhost:12347/`
to 
`--web3-url=ws://localhost:12347/`
